# cloudflare_zero_trust_access_ai_controls_mcp_server (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudflare_zero_trust_access_ai_controls_mcp_server" "example_zero_trust_access_ai_controls_mcp_server" {
  account_id = "a86a8f5c339544d7bdc89926de14fb8c"
  id = "my-mcp-server"
}
```

- `account_id` (String)

- `created_by` (String)
- `description` (String)
- `error` (String)

- `modified_by` (String)
